description:
Primary Skills : Spark, Python, SQL, Data Science

Location : San Francisco / Hybrid to Client's footprint locations

Duration : 18 Months +

Contract Type : W2

Pay range : $70.00 - $90.00 Per hour

TALK to a recruiter NOW : CONTACT

Priti @ 408-907-4151

Grow your skills by working with the best in the industry.

JOB RESPONSIBILITIES :
• You will be responsible for ensuring data quality and improving testing efficiency for Client's Vision team.
• The ideal candidate will have 5 years of experience in data quality and anomaly detection.
• Proficiency in Databricks, Spark, Python or SQL, advanced debugging.

JOB REQUIREMENTS :
• 5 years of experience in designing and executing queries and reports to ensure data quality and detect anomalies.
• Experience in Data Science Background.
• 3 years of experience with Spark, Python, or SQL for data processing and analytics, JIRA , Charles, Postman

CALL NOW : Priti @ 408-907-4151
